title: BARD AND Ohmwrecker
body: bard ult lasts for 2.5 seconds, and ohmwrecker an item that is so under valued can stun turrets for 3 seconds, in total you can stun a turret for up to 5.5 seconds making it plenty of time to dive your opponent, and since bard has great roaming potential, he can dive opponents without the need of his ult, and just purely just the item, it gives so many awesome stats, 50 armor, 10% CDR 300 hp, and 150% base health regen, you get tanky stats, and get an item that is really usefull mid game, late game not so much since tanks take 0 damage from turrets and ADC nowadays.. but still this item has such great potential and im gonna start using it when i play zac in the jungle, zac's diving potential is so insane,and adding the fact that you can disable the turret adds more to his diving potential to turn out as a success.

replies.body: Too many other great items to buy. Spooky Ghosts make diving/catches so much easier while also making you move faster at all times. Ohmwrecker basically only offers dead stats for most champs, nobody can afford to buy that and the active isn't good enough to make it useful. Maybe if it increased the damage towers take for the duration.

Or you could be smarter and just buy a warmogs

+800 health means the turret's gotta shoot you about 8 more times, which takes about 12 seconds to do.

Or better yet play alistar who can press r to ignore the turret entirely for it's duration while having targetted guranteed cc that even a trained monkey could execute.

yeeeah, that is not how a turret works buddy. Turrets do increased damage the more it hits you, so Alistar assuming he has 1.5k hp and his ult active, can take up to 6 tower shots before he falls

if you need the item in order to succeed in tower dives then I don't know what to say. Turrets don't do much damage and unless your ADC or some other squishy decides that it's a great idea to face tank the tower throughout the entire duration of the dive the item loses a lot of it's usefulness. in theory.. yes... you could do this to disable to enemy turret for 5.5 seconds.

 in practice.. past 15 min the enemy  turret might was well not even be there in the first place.. for all the "defending the player" its going to be doing.

 so sure u can disable it but... why bother?

 i mean it reminds me of the time when i was training to be an aircraft mechanic in school before i got my FAA license
when there  was supposedly some "terrorist plot" to ignite kerosene pipeline to the airport and blow up all the just fuel and are airport and stuff.. and  some people in the government got scared and then some guy just pointed out... you _can't_ ignite the stuff in liquid form.. like period and demonstrated by taking and bowl of jet fuel and dropping a lit match into it.. and the match went out. for kerosene to ignite it has to be sprayed into an extremely fine mist at the proper air fuel ratio and at extremely high heat

 like sure...  the plan sounds like it would work.. but when u really think about it... it wont... because you don't understand the specifics of it.. in your case... you don't understand that  past 15 min... no tower is a threat even to squishy champion  in about 90% of cases.
